title: Lithium decorated 2D orthorhombic (o)-B2X2 monolayers for hydrogen storage: first principles calculations
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1719-1729
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00173G, Paper
Ayoub Benaddi, Abdelali Elomrani, Mohammed Lamhani, Said Oukahou, Mohammad Maymoun, Mohamed Yassine Fatihi, Abdellatif Hasnaoui
The study investigates the potential of Lithium-decorated 2D orthorhombic (o)-B2X2 monolayers as a solid medium for hydrogen storage, highlighting their great characteristics.
